author: cnbc.com
title: AppFolio: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SANTA BARBARA, Calif. (AP) _ AppFolio Inc. (APPF) on Monday reported first-quarter profit of $4.3 million.
On a per-share basis, the Santa Barbara, California-based company said it had net income of 12 cents. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense, came to 15 cents per share.
The property management software maker posted revenue of $42.3 million in the period.
AppFolio expects full-year revenue in the range of $179 million to $182 million.
AppFolio shares have increased 16 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Monday, shares hit $47.95, a climb of 81 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on APPF at https://www.zacks.com/ap/APPF
